citethispage-desc: El sgionta ona piagina special per i [[Special:CiteThisPage|citazzion]] e on ligam in di istroment
tooltip-citethispage: Informazzion sora come cità quella pagina chì
citethispage-badrevision: Error: a l'è stada  trovada nissuna version per la pagina "$1" con ID version $2.
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== Detali bibliografich per {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Nom de la pagina: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Autor: contributor de {{SITENAME}} * Editor: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Data de l' ultima revision: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Data de la citazzion: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * URL permanent: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * ID de la version de la pagina: {{REVISIONID}}
== Stil de citazzion per {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[stil APA]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Tirad sgiò {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} de {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[The MLA style manual|stil MLA]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide Style Guide|stil MHRA]] === {{SITENAME}} contributor, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [accessed {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|stil Chicago]] === {{SITENAME}} contributor, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (sità {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|stil CBE/CSE]] === {{SITENAME}} contributor. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [cited {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Disponìbil da: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|stil Bluebook]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (ultima visita {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Vos [[BibTeX]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, autor = "{{SITENAME}}", titol = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", ann = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[In linea; andad denter el {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } In del drovà l'URL compless [[LaTeX]] (\usepackage{url} in d'ona quai part in del'introduzzion) che la tend a fornì di adress web ben pussee formatad, l'è de vesser preferida la manera chì de sota: @misc{ wiki:xxx, auhotr = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[An linia; trovà {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
